# Getting started
```{r setup}
library(chatgptR)
OPENAI_API_KEY="your api key..."
Sys.setenv(OPENAI_API_KEY = OPENAI_API_KEY)
Sys.setenv(OPENAI_RETURN_LANGUAGE = "englsih") #korean
Sys.setenv(OPENAI_VERBOSE=FALSE) #or TRUE
```
